amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for purchase of non-combat vehicles for use outside of the U.S. if such vehicles are not substantially manufactured in the U.S.

action.text: Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Murphy (CT) amendment (A071). Mr. Young (FL) stated that the provisions of the Murphy (CT) amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
